text: Ok kids!
I hope you all had a wonderful time at the masquerade
Its getting late you should all be getting home now.
We should do this again real soon.
Thank you little Elves, for helping me out with the party.
We so enjoyed it.
C’mon, if we hurry, we can stop by at the new toy store at the mall.
Oh yes lets do that.
Grab your coats.
The last one out is a slow-poke!
I think Jack is the Slow- poke.
Oh, No I am not…
You were behind me.
Uh huh!
I think Bob is the Slow-poke.
He is still inside.
Hey Bob! You are late..
You kids carry on
I have to get the house in order. Maybe, I will join you later.
Maybe, I will join you later.
Awww Bob, we will miss you.
Have fun at the store kids.
Be safe.
Bye
I do feel bad about leaving Bob behind.
But if we wait for him, the store will shut.
You know, he did call us his little elves.
And what do elves do?
They help!
If we help Bob around the house, he will finish his chores faster
And be able to come with us.

We are little and we are small
But we can help you clean it all.

‘cause that’s what we elves do
We are the helping crew.

Lets make it neat, lets make it right
Lets put these cartons out of sight.

‘cause that’s what we elves do
We are the helping crew.

Clean, clean, squeaky clean
The dishes sparkle and gleam

‘cause that’s what we elves do
We are the helping crew.

Fold the clothes real nice
Once, twice and ah.. thrice

cause that’s what we elves do
We are the helping crew.
Thank you, my lovely elves.
My house has never looked so lovely.
And you know what Bob, we actually enjoyed helping out.
Yeah..in fact, I think I will help my Mom around the house. It is so easy… and fun
It is so easy… and fun
That’s wonderful kids.
I am glad you enjoyed the evening and now, the last one out is……?
The Slow-poke!
Are you all ready to be little elves in your house?
I am sure your Mom and Dad will be happy with your help.
And guess what, it is fun too.
Have a wonderful day filled with joy, laughter and learning!
See you soon.
